biotools.summary: Statistical compression of protein sequences and inference of marginal probability landscapes over competing alignments using finite state models and Dirichlet priors | Minimum Message Length (MML) based aligner of protein (amino acid) sequences | Dependencies: GNUMake or equivalent.
